article_title: Hamas says 70 killed in Israeli strike on camp
sentence: Hamas  says  70  killed  in  Israeli  strike  on  camp  T-I-T-L-E-E-N-D.

article_title: Hamas says 70 killed in Israeli strike on camp
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  an  Israeli  air  strike  killed  at  least  70  people  in  the  Al-Maghazi  refugee  camp  in  the  centre  of  the  strip.

article_title: Hamas says 70 killed in Israeli strike on camp
sentence: According  to  the  health  ministry,  more  than  20,000  people  have  been  killed  -  mostly  children  and  women  -  and  54,000  injured  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  and  other  Palestinian  groups  attacked  Israel,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  about  240  hostages.

article_title: Hamas says 70 killed in Israeli strike on camp
sentence: According  to  the  health  ministry,  more  than  20,000  people  have  been  killed  -  mostly  children  and  women  -  and  54,000  injured  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  and  other  Palestinian  groups  attacked  Israel,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  about  240  hostages.

article_title: Hamas says 70 killed in Israeli strike on camp
sentence: The  Israeli  military  said  more  than  a  dozen  soldiers  had  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  Friday,  bringing  the  total  for  the  ground  offensive  launched  after  7  October  to  156.
